Dermaplaning 101

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.1″ text_font=”||||||||” header_font=”||||||||” header_3_font=”DM Serif Display|600|||||||” header_3_text_color=”#000000″ header_3_font_size=”36px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]

Dermaplaning Course

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.11.1″ text_font=”Open Sans||||||||” text_text_color=”#486066″ text_font_size=”15px” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”||||||||” header_4_font=”Poppins|||on|||||” header_4_font_size=”16px” hover_enabled=”0″ global_colors_info=”{}” sticky_enabled=”0″]Dermaplaning is a method of exfoliation that consists of using a sterile surgical scalpel. It is used to scrape off the top layer of dull dead skin cells and vellus hair (peach fuzz), in order to reveal a smoother, brighter complexion.

Benefits of Dermplaning:

Exfoliates and removes surface debris, dead skin, and peach fuzz
Diminishes fine lines and wrinkles
Stimulates Collagen Synthesis
Reduces Pigmentation
Reduces the appearance of acne scars
Provides deeper product penetration
Promotes smoother skin
Works on all skin types
Instant results and no downtime

Course Includes:

An interactive presentation
Learning materials & reference guides
Live Demo
Practice labs
Hands on Practice
Medical history & Consent forms
Certificate of Completion

Training Kit:

1 DermaPlaning Tool
20 Disposable Blade
Blade remover box
Enzyme Peel & Clarifying Cleanser

COST:

$595

Hurry up and schedule your training today![/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”#contact-us” url_new_window=”on” button_text=”Reserve Your Spot” button_alignment=”left” module_class=”reserve” _builder_version=”4.6.4″ custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”14px” button_text_color=”#000000″ button_bg_color=”#e8ad9d” button_border_width=”0px” button_border_radius=”0px” button_letter_spacing=”2px” button_font=”Muli|700||on|||||” button_icon=”%%3%%” custom_padding=”20px|40px|20px|40px|true|true” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”right” animation_intensity_slide=”5%” box_shadow_style=”preset4″ box_shadow_horizontal=”0px” box_shadow_vertical=”6px” box_shadow_color=”#000000″ locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]
